timeline.body:
Thoughts on pluralizing it now that it's an array?

```suggestion
    String[] permissions() default {};
```
timeline.bodyHTML:
Thoughts on pluralizing it now that it's an array?

Suggested change
String[] permission() default {};
String[] permissions() default {};
timeline.author: imhoffd

replies.bodyText: It makes sense because it can be one or many but I hesitate because the parent element is called "permissions" which is made up of one or many @Permission annotations, which then can contain one or many "permission" manifest constants. Im thinking of renaming it to something like "constants" or "strings" but that sounds awfully generic
